feed.title: Badal Yadav - food
feed.subtitle: Badal is kind, caring and timid, but also demanding, calculating, and ruthless. His invented pseudonym, Heisenberg, becomes an alter ego â€“ a fantasy for him to live out a love of power. Beneath both sides of his dual personality, he views the world in the rarefied scientific terms of chemistry.

entry.title: Food I Like
entry.content:
Beverage

  • Coconut Water
  • Buttermilk n Lassi

Snacks

  • Flavoured Roasted Gram
  • Flavoured Makhana, ex : Mr. Makhana

Street Foods

  • Maggi/Noodles (ofc)
